bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.summary: â€œlabel" with issue only work for PAI "contributors"
bug.description: Only contributor (or github user who can merge PR to PAI) can create issues with the label, we need to figure out a way to fix it.

comments.comment: According to <denchmark-link:https://help.github.com/articles/applying-labels-to-issues-and-pull-requests/>GitHub Help</denchmark-link> , only users with write access can assign labels to issues and pull requests.
@lvbriage had fixed similar issue in NNI, should be a quick fix.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/abuccts>@abuccts</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Gerhut>@Gerhut</denchmark-link> - is this in 0.11.0 or just master?
